name: Gunfight (Cmski)
description:
For 1-4 players. Play against friends or AI.

Scramble to pick up weapons and be the last one standing.

4 Unique Maps. 10 Unique weapons. 1000+ cosmetic combinations.

Gamepad or Keyboard/Mouse.

Debug is still in the game so press M for next room or R to restart.

Made in a few weeks for an academic project.
